title: An exposition of the Lords praier in the way of catechisme By William Perkins
author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.
publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, printer to the Kings Maiestie,
notes: Another edition of Perkins, William.  "Perkins upon the Lords praier", corrected by the author and enlarged.
Running title reads: An exposition vpon the L. Praier.
Imperfect; lacks G1-3 and all after G8.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
